title: Random Ping spikes.
body:
I  average around 35-40 ping, but lately probably about last week i started to get ping spikes. I can have 38 ping and constantly spike up to 3k or sometimes just 200 causes me to glitch a lot in game and everything. It only happens on league i have no problem lagging or spiking on any other game. 
Here is a screen shot of my logs.  http://imgur.com/a/OHXlj

replies.body:
Yup, that definitely looks like packet loss. @_@

It's likely you've tried them already if you're checking logs, but just in case I want to suggest the steps in our troubleshooting guide for connection errors [**right here**](http://riot.com/12B7oac) Often just those can be enough to find the cause for the packet loss and eliminate it.

However, if you've already tried em out, definitely reach out to our Tech team [**in a ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll be able to give a more in depth search for what's causing the loss one on one, and hopefully find a swift fix for it as well!
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
